newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Oct 16.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Oct 16.

text.p: These are significant stories in the Ivorian press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Ivory Coast needs 500 billion CFA francs between now and 2010 for its action plan for the environment, Prime Minister Daniel Kablan Duncan tells a fund-raising roundtable in Abidjan.
- President Henri Konan Bedie gives key address in Rome today at World Food Day ceremony staged by U.N. World Food Programme.
- Start of new school year: classes yet to begin.
- Ivorian Popular Front Party resumes full political activity on November 2 after traditional summer lull.
- Financing of Ivory Coast's environment programme: donors yet to be convinced
